TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_vasa, title = vasa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/vasa} }

S.FORM: mavan a tjaljapazangalan a lami nua payuwan aicu a vasa, qaw izua a maretimaljimalji a vasa i quma na payuwan. uri kivasa a payuwan tu capain sa sinan ta aradj kasicuayan. pinicapa na payuwan ta vasa izua ivavaw ta qepuan a cekes tu cemapacapa tu liawanan a qadaw, qaw masan ta kakanen nua payuwan aicu a vasa sa maqati a semeliulj tiamadju nu magaku a masengseng kasicuayan. palisian izua palisian a patjara vasa na payuwan. capain aicu a kinakina na vasa tja capain a seman aradj uming sangua' aravac azua cinavu tua uming a 'avay. aradj aicu a qapulu na vasa tja capain a seman aradj. nu vaik a cinunan a semagadu kemacu ta aradj. kaizuanan 鄭漢文,王相華,鄭惠芬, .P170.

mavan a tjaljapazangalan a lami noa payowan aico a vasa, qaw izoa a maretimaljimalji a vasa i qoma na payowan. ori kivasa a payowan to capain sa sinan ta aradj kasicoayan. pinicapa na payowan ta vasa izoa ivavaw ta qepoan a cekes to cemapacapa to liawanan a qadaw, qaw masan ta kakanen noa payowan aico a vasa sa maqati a semeliolj tiamadjo no magako a masengseng kasicoayan. palisian izoa palisian a patjara vasa na payowan. capain aico a kinakina na vasa tja capain a seman aradj oming sangoa' aravac azoa cinavo toa oming a 'avay. aradj aico a qapolo na vasa tja capain a seman aradj. no vaik a cinonan a semagado kemaco ta aradj. kaizoanan 鄭漢文,王相華,鄭惠芬, .P170.
